    Selected Projects

    Breast Cancer Treatment

    Developed an end-end ML system, consisting of classification and segmentation, to grade IHC images and suggest an appropriate treatment corresponding to the grade.

    Github Link

    Blindness Severity Detection

    Developed a system consisting CNNs and EfficientNet to detect blindness caused due to Diabetic Retinopathy. This system achieved an accuracy of 94.80%.

    Github Link

    Prostate Cancer Grade Detection

    Developed a system to detect the ISUP grade of prostate cancer. The system achieved an accuracy of 92.38% in grading (Consists of finding and classifying cancer tissue).

    Github Link

    Automatic Music Generation

    Developed a Sequence-to-Sequence RNN with LSTM that can learn chord progressions from music in the training data and generate new music.

    Github Link

    Implementation of ECN+ for ns-3

    Implemented ECN+ in ns-3, an extension of ECN aiming to solve a drawback of ECN. ECN is a signaling mechanism used to signal the sender about congestion in a network.

    Github Link

    Social Sale

    Socialsale is an e-commerce and mentoring web-application platform, with a chatbot support, available to all students within a college to exchange products and information.

    Github Link
